name: Chef Shirley Temple
address: Based in Albuquerque and Santa Fe, NM (travels throughout the U.S. and abroad)
description: A private chef offering holistic cheffing with French roots, inspired by global travels and functional nutrition. She specializes in personalized meals for private clients, retreats, and events, catering to various dietary restrictions
services: Buddhist-owned In-home cooking in New-Mexico consultation

name: ChefMaison (Various Private Chefs)
description: ChefMaison connects clients with private chefs for in-home dining experiences. Chefs are skilled in various cuisines and can create personalized menus for any occasion

name: Take a Chef (Various Private Chefs)
address: Services available throughout New Mexico, with many chefs based in Albuquerque and Santa Fe
description: This platform allows you to hire private chefs for in-home dining. You can receive proposals from chefs and chat with them to customize your menu
services: Buddhist-owned In-home cooking in New-Mexico consultation

name: Cozymeal (Various Private Chefs in Albuquerque)
description: Cozymeal offers private chefs for in-home dining experiences in Albuquerque, handling everything from grocery shopping to cleanup

name: Golden Ladle Catering (Ye Win Aung and Shwe Zin Oo)
description: This catering business, run by a couple from Burma, offers authentic Burmese cuisine. They have experience with cooking classes and running a family restaurant

name: Sharon's Gourmet to Go
description: A locally owned catering company offering diverse menu items, including New Mexican, Jewish, Kosher, and Middle Eastern cuisines, and catering to dietary restrictions

name: Taco Buddha
address: 7405 Pershing Ave, University City, MO 63130 and 11111 Manchester Rd, Kirkwood, MO 63122 (Note: These are in Missouri, not New Mexico, but the name includes "Buddha" and they offer catering.)

name: Local Farmers Markets and Food Festivals
description: Many home-based food businesses, including those operating under cottage food laws, sell their products at local farmers markets and food festivals. This is a good way to discover local, independent food producers

name: Online Marketplaces (e.g., Etsy, local Facebook groups)
description: Some home-based food businesses may sell their products online through platforms like Etsy or local community Facebook groups. Searching these platforms with relevant keywords might yield results

name: New Mexico Environment Department (for general food business information)
address: 7301 Box Canyon Rd NW, Albuquerque, NM 87120
description: While not a business, the New Mexico Environment Department provides information on food safety regulations and licensing for food businesses, including those operating from home
